text: The Emblem of Manipur is the State Emblem of Manipur. It was officially adopted by the Government of Manipur on 18 December 1980. It represents the Kanglasha, a mythical dragon lion god in Meitei mythology and religion. ==Other websites== * http://www.hubert-herald.nl/BhaManipur.htm * http://www.e-pao.net/epGallery.asp?id=3&src;=News_Related/Archived_News_Photo/NewsPhotoArchive_2014_2 * https://www.britannica.com/place/Manipur Category:Manipur
title: Emblem of Manipur
